Description: Splash Screen
Login/Sign Up requesting mobile number with country picker and Continue.

OTP verification with countdown timer under inputs; disabled Continue.

Capture name/email with photo prompt and Continue CTA.

Company created success confirmation with Go to Home.

Personal info step capturing name, gender, DOB, marital status with photo prompt.
Contact info step capturing phone, email, address, state, city.
Upload personal ID step: national ID number and NIDA certificate upload.
Account completion success confirmation with Go to Home CTA.

Home dashboard with populated counters and active trip/requested quote cards plus quick stats carousel.

Company profile summary cards (Company, Contact, Documents, Bank, Emergency) with inline edit.

Individual quote flow: select company from list of options.
Individual quote flow: selected company chips shown before proceeding.
Private tab quotes list with search/filter and quote card showing Awaiting Bid.
Filter bottom sheet (status chips accepted/pending/rejected/completed, duration presets) with apply/clear.

Accept offer confirmation modal with Yes/No actions.
Quotation Details accepted state; trip status pending; accepted bid summary with pricing and call.
Quotation Details with active trip progress, accepted bid, pricing, and Download Invoice CTA.
Profile hub with avatar, metrics, and menu links (Company Info, Help & Support, FAQs, Terms, Settings) plus Logout.
Company Details view showing owner info (name/phone/email) with edit affordance.

Terms & Conditions content page with legal text and scrollable body.
Help & Support chat conversation view with message composer.
Settings > Notifications toggles for SMS/Whatsapp/Push and Delete Account action.
Profile picture update sheet with select/take/remove photo options and Update button.
Help & Support modal with contact options (Chat, Call, Email) from profile.

Quotes filter bottom sheet (status chips, duration presets) with apply/clear.

Bid detail bottom sheet with price breakdown and Accept/Reject actions.

Quotation Details accepted state with call option and pricing breakdown.

Quotation Details bids tab with overflow menu open (Share/Help).
